title: There's Always A Faster Gun
body:
Whenever I start to think I'm getting better at this game, that I might escape iron someday, I run into someone who reminds me that there's always a faster gun, even in low iron. I'm reminded of the fact that this game isn't about improving alone, but improving _faster_ than the rest of the playerbase improves. 

I do wish Coy Coy the best of luck in his endeavors. He seems to have found his stride and will likely leave iron soon. Thanks for the game, mate. 

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=coycoy
